nda.kb_hint: Typical NDA includes: definition of confidential information, purpose limitation, non-use, non-disclosure, standard carve-outs (public domain, already known, independently developed, required by law), duration 2-3 years post-termination, return or destroy, injunctive relief, governing law.
risks: Perpetual confidentiality with no time limit
nda.negotiation_tip: Narrow confidential info definition, include carve-outs, set survival 2 years, define purpose, add mutuality where appropriate.
